dataList.dlg: Breaking through.
Impaled.
Acknowledged.
... I will cut him down.
This is where it ends.
This is where it ends.
Ezra. Vespa. Assist the LCB personnel as you cover me.
Ezra. Vespa. Assist the LCB personnel as you cover me.
Every atrocious moment of the past throughout my life swirls around me.
*puff* All of that malice, full to the brim.
Crimson Point.
Crimson... Point.
Monsters...! I'll burn you all to ash!
I'm sorry, Boss. But I can't think of anything better than this to take them down.
As long as I can burn those horrible things to ash, I'll...! I'll gladly throw myself to the fire...!
As long as I can burn those horrible things to ash, I'll...! I'll gladly throw myself to the fire...!

dataList.dlg: Nngh... I promise I'll kill you both... No matter what it takes...
Boosting E.G.O Attunement... Fire.
A proper researcher... has no interest in faux imitation!
Let's brighten... the road ahead, so I can have a good view of the lives I must save.
So you... You are the beast of this forest.
Darn it...

Acceleration Punch!
Acceleration Punch!
Acceleration Punch!
Acceleration Punch!
Acceleration Punch!

Whoosh... Pow!!

Five times the weight!

Spread the impact!

Screw Hammer!

... and drill!

All-out Attack Mode, Mk. 17!

YuRia Axe!
YuRia Axe!
YuRia Axe!
TAAAAKE THAAAAT!
TAAAAKE THAAAAT!
TAAAAKE THAAAAT!

Team Leader! I'm counting on you as always!
I'm the one you're up against!
This is nothing. Leave it to us!
You'll have to get through me first!
No way I'm letting our junior steal all the spotlight!
Gotcha!!
Gotcha!!
Gotcha!!
These toys...
These toys...
... ain't fun...
... ain't fun...
... no more!
... no more!
C'mere!
C'mere!
Oh yeah, I'm down to unbox a layer for this fight!
Interesting... So this is what it feels like to meet a Color Fixer in battle!
You're pushin' me to go balls out... Hah!
Be warned, it's gonna be hot.
Hot as hell!
Hah! Bullseye!
Hah! Bullseye!
C'mere!
C'mere!
C'mere!

You...!

dataList.dlg: That's my little girl!
... I-if I can make it through this test... I can become M-Mister Rien's daughter too, like Yoshihide, my big sis!

dataList.desc: 검지 제자 턴 시작 시, 압박감 또는 압박감-신이 처음으로 3이 되었을 때 <하>
dataList.dlg: "Clock," "return path," "pure-white." P-please don't interfere. M-my big sis must be completed. For the Prescript... and for me.
My cherished hope... I s-simply follow it.
... W-were they not one and the same? M-my immanent yearning—and the Prescript...
So that... is the state of Muga, the non-self... Even her own self is forgotten.
I have failed to save my master... That is my woeful regret...
One, two! Three! Hyah!
One, two! Three! Hyah!
One, two! Three! Hyah!
Phew... This is just like that final battle in Episode 24!
Take my ultimate move! Violet~ Breaking Slam!!!

dataList.dlg: I'm doing my part.
You will not get past me.
Agh.
Fuck off!
Feeling confident today? Then parry this, asshole.
Match my hatred.
Distraction'll bury you six-feet under!
Hahahahaha!
And the hunt comes to a close!
I'll make mincemeat out of you all!
Yeah, I hate you all! The damn Famiglia, you, and Ticket, too!
I'm sick and tired of Ticket and her meddling fools—to hell with you all!

Shit!
Shit!
Shit!
Shit!

dataList.dlg: Lucio! Are you about done cleaning up the fodder— Hah, figured as much. Idiot.

dataList.desc: 엄지 아비 신을 얻은 턴 시작시
dataList.dlg: I'll be damned before I let you ruin this! Not after toiling like a goddamn dog for decades, climbing up the ranks...!

dataList.desc: 흐트러짐 해제하고, 다음 턴 시작 시
dataList.dlg: Fuck you! I am Valencina della Famiglia Bognatelli...! I refuse to rot in this fucking dump!

dataList.desc: 엄지 아비 2페이즈에서 엄지 제자가 전투 불능 되고 혼자서 전투 할 때
dataList.dlg: Fall back, Lucio, you're getting in the way! Listen, you don't get to die until you're done teaching Ticket everything she forgot, capisce?
Intrude. Infest.
Intrude. Infest. Thrive.
Chaotic, oblivious... Consumption.
I hear it. The abominable, skittering echo outside the window.
Scour every corner, swarm every height, and take flight.
Proliferate. Infest. Horrify... Down in the depths of our fall... Transform.
All that stands in the way... shall be ground to dust.
Feast. Indulgence.
Suddenly, one day... You will awaken from your nightmare, and realize that the crawling death has stalked your steps.
Interdict the threat.

dataList.desc: 바퀴황제 그레고르 3페이즈 시작한 최초 턴 시작 시
dataList.dlg: Loathing. Neglect. Contempt. Isolation. Familiar hush, all.

dataList.dlg: Let the swarm pullulate. Let the blackest dark plague.
March. March. Consume.
Procreate. Consume. Erase.
Erase. Regenerate. March.

dataList.dlg: How long do you think you can keep this up?
This exclusive obsession with only what the eyes can see... A curse so uniquely human.
This exclusive obsession with only what the eyes can see... A curse so uniquely human.
Time to pay the price.
You've put too much faith in that trinket. Foolishness.

dataList.desc: 베르길리우스 인격이 1명 죽은 상태로 턴 시작시
dataList.dlg: Dante. I understand it may be difficult to not cast your gaze here, given the circumstances. But... you'd best pay attention to your battle rather than let the deaths here distract you.

dataList.desc: 베르길리우스 인격이 1명 죽은 상태로 턴 시작시
dataList.dlg: Dante, you'd best pay attention to Sinner #4 instead of letting the deaths here distract your gaze.

I will wager my life.
So that I may engrave it all into these eyes...
but not be bound by it...

dataList.dlg: ... We've already come this far. I will continue to protect this flow.

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 기믹 패턴의 턴 시작시
dataList.dlg: Don't ask me who I am. It's a meaningless question.
Anxiously I have awaited.
Desperately I have hoped.
Beyond all reckoning, I have blamed.
Anxiously I have awaited.

dataList.dlg: Mang of Resentment (怨望), Mang of Futility (非望), Mang of Dismay (落望). What is left to rage on... is only my wretched heart.

dataList.dlg: This blade... was not strong enough to sever.

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 페이즈 전환된 턴 시작시 흐트러짐
dataList.dlg: ... Not yet. I do not wish... to return yet.

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 망을 최대 3개까지 생성하여 공격하는 필살기
dataList.dlg: Mang of Resentment (怨望).

dataList.dlg: Mang of Resentment (怨望), Mang of Futility (非望).

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 망을 최대 3개까지 생성하여 공격하는 필살기
dataList.dlg: Mang of Resentment (怨望), Mang of Futility (非望), Mang of Dismay (落望). What is left to rage on... is only my wretched heart.

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 필살기 전조 기믹 처리 성공
dataList.dlg: Looking on askance, the resentment may dull...

dataList.desc: 소지 아비 필살기 전조 기믹 처리 실패
dataList.dlg: Yet noontide and eventide lay forgotten, as I sunder even the close of the day.
I may speak of it, but will it be remembered at all?
Hydrangeas bloomed that day, yet still there was no return;
Even the few words of promise have sunk into oblivion.
It is better, then... to sever them here.
Those prostheses... let me purge them off you.
I, too, once sought the answer from knowledge.
Though now, I've come to realize that knowledge holds no answers.
A bottle of wine would've gone nicely with this technique...
Looks like my past self has faced some tough battles, too.
Let me show you the singular teaching that has shaped my life.
This lonely path of adversity, the path of my choosing.
This lonely path of adversity, the path of my choosing.
Emptiness of sound, emptiness of form, and... emptiness of mind.

dataList.desc: 미래 싱클레어 약지 아비 필살기 종료 시, 약지 제자 필살기 종료 시
dataList.dlg: This kind of art isn't really to my liking.

dataList.desc: 미래 싱클레어 약지 아비 필살기 종료 시, 약지 제자 필살기 종료 시
dataList.dlg: This kind of art isn't really to my liking.

dataList.dlg: I think I've heard enough.

dataList.desc: 미래 싱클레어 약지 아비 필살기 종료 시, 약지 제자 필살기 종료 시
dataList.dlg: You don't want to overexplain art.
Shall we explore deeper? Let's see what other beauty remains within you.
Shall we explore deeper? Let's see what other beauty remains within you.
Do you hear it? Listen to Tibia's melody, the euphonious harmony of the humerus pair and 24 ribs!
Veins and arteries. The bicolor shades of red that will flow out of you... Aah...! Marvelous art!
Albina. The time has arrived to exhibit the art of Corporism.

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 수감자 또는 조력자에게 133105 사용시
dataList.dlg: Such enthusiastic participation from the audience... not bad at all!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 수감자 또는 조력자에게 133105 사용시
dataList.dlg: Such enthusiastic participation from the audience... not bad at all!
The gallery's closing hour is here, everyone. Fare you well!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 원호 방어 발동 시 (133107 사용전)
dataList.dlg: Direct any concerns to me—the Maestro of this gallery!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 원호 방어 발동 시 (133107 사용전)
dataList.dlg: Direct any concerns to me—the Maestro of this gallery!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 원호 방어 발동 시 (133107 사용전)
dataList.dlg: Vandalism is prohibited!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 원호 방어 발동 시 (133107 사용전)
dataList.dlg: Vandalism is prohibited!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 흐트러짐 상태 해제 시
dataList.dlg: I cannot let the audience witness such a degrading sight.
Those eyes... that corpus... It's you. You are the honored appraiser that will critique my work!
How do you find it? Please, do speak... Share with me your impression!
This is the art of Corporism! Allow me to present it in all its vim and vigor!
This is the art of Corporism! Allow me to present it in all its vim and vigor!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 각성 싱클레어가 약지 제자를 공격할 때, 해당 공격을 원호 방어 시
dataList.dlg: No, not to Albina! Let me hear it!

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 약지 제자 사망 후 다음 턴 시작 시
dataList.dlg: The scars you left on Albina will sublimate her into a masterpiece.

dataList.desc: 약지 아비 흐트러짐 상태 해제 시
dataList.dlg: There's more! There is much I have yet to show you.
I'll pull you apart... with every spark of inspiration.
Your diaphragm springs with such suppleness... Show me more. Show me your inner self.
I'll complete it this time. A masterpiece worthy of the Maestro's approval...!
Perk up your ears and listen. Listen to Fascia's heartbeat... this pulsating sound of life.

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 더하기 코인 약화 1 이상, 위력 감소 1 이상일 때 133605 공격 종료 시
dataList.dlg: I'm sorry, Fascia. I was in too much of a hurry...

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 턴 시작 시 흐트러짐 상태면
dataList.dlg: What a dedicated observation... my art is honored.

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 원호 방어 발동 시 (133607 사용전)
dataList.dlg: Please do not touch the artwork.

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 원호 방어 발동 시 (133607 사용전)
dataList.dlg: I don't appreciate acts of vandalism.

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 약지 아비 필살기 사용으로 작품명 티비아 소멸하고, 아군 정신력 회복 시
dataList.dlg: Watch the utter precision with which the joints are balanced. The perfect blending of sanguineousness. Che bello.
This quivering... Fascia, are you scared?
Fascia... is shrieking...

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 각성 싱클레어가 약지 아비를 공격할 때, 해당 공격을 원호 방어 시
dataList.dlg: Let me see it too. The art you have gazed upon.

... If I let you go here, you will never come home again. I could force you to stay, but I'd get nothing of it. But... that's still better than letting this empty regret burrow through my heart, isn't it? Hah. Alright. Let's get started.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 턴 종료 시, 해금 - I 얻을 때
dataList.dlg: Wading through a dream, the self nowhere to be found. (無我夢中)

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 턴 종료 시, 해금 - II 얻을 때
dataList.dlg: Like the Naraka of Avīci and Raurava. (阿鼻叫喚)

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 턴 종료 시, 해금 - III 얻을 때
dataList.dlg: Severed and torn until even the form is undone. (支離滅裂)

dataList.dlg: I know your habits inside and out.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 료슈와 합을 진행하여 검지 아비가 처음으로 료슈를 흐트러뜨릴 시
dataList.dlg: Tu es belle à force d'être.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 료슈와 합을 진행하여 검지 아비가 처음으로 합 패배 시
dataList.dlg: Haha. Impressive!

dataList.dlg: One.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 1 -> 2 될 때
dataList.dlg: Two.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 2 -> 3 될 때
dataList.dlg: Trois.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 3 -> 4 될 때
dataList.dlg: Four.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 4 -> 5 될 때
dataList.dlg: Five.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 5 -> 6 될 때
dataList.dlg: Six.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 6 -> 7 될 때
dataList.dlg: Seven. Two to go.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 7 -> 8 될 때
dataList.dlg: Eight. One left.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 해방 스택 (9일 경우, 다음 턴에 Furioso) 8 -> 9 될 때
dataList.dlg: Neuf. Executed.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134707 (적당히 강한 스킬 1) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "Lance the heart and hang upside-down."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134708 (적당히 강한 스킬 2) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "Hammer and crush under the weight."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134709 (적당히 강한 스킬 3) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "Peck away with a sword and gnaw."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134711 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 1페이즈 강력한 스킬) 처음으로 준비되었을 때, 대사
dataList.dlg: After all that's happened... This day has come.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134711 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 1페이즈 강력한 스킬) 처음 이후로 준비될 때마다, 대사
dataList.dlg: You know it, don't you, sweetheart? It's pointless to predict my moves.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134711 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 1페이즈 강력한 스킬) 공격 시 대사 1
dataList.dlg: There is no reason for you to leave, darling. Because you've forgotten everything. You have nothing.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134711 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 1페이즈 강력한 스킬) 공격 시 대사 1
dataList.dlg: There is no reason for you to leave, darling. Because you've forgotten everything. You have nothing.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134711 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 1페이즈 강력한 스킬) 공격 시 대사 2
dataList.dlg: There's only one way out. The same way you came in from—the way home.
There was no reason to... treat this wound.
It was sure to burn again once you returned home anyway...
May as well get used to it, right?
Sweetie, all would be well if you'd just stay. The House of Spiders doesn't have to disappear.
So please... don't leave.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134807 (적당히 강한 스킬 1) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "Enwrap in long swaths of frozen blood."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134808 (적당히 강한 스킬 2) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "Clap without a sound, slash without a voice."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134809 (적당히 강한 스킬 3) 사용 시
dataList.dlg: "With a sharpened blade, cry out like the scent of fallen leaves and the roar of a waterfall."

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134811 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 강력한 스킬) 처음으로 준비되었을 때, 대사
dataList.dlg: No need to wander outside. This is the hell where you should be.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134811 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 강력한 스킬) 처음 이후에 준비될 때마다, 대사
dataList.dlg: You belong here, in this hell.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134811 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 강력한 스킬) 처음 이후에 준비될 때마다, 대사
dataList.dlg: You belong here, in this hell.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134811 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 1
dataList.dlg: A dimwitted fool living a fabricated life. That's what you are. And who I am...

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134811 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 2
dataList.dlg: You've come too far to be free. Flee, if you will... but the soldiers of gods will pursue you.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 준비되었을 때, 대사
dataList.dlg:
You cannot cut this off, sweetheart.
... This isn't something you can break off so easily.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 준비되었을 때, 대사
dataList.dlg:
You cannot cut this off, sweetheart.
... This isn't something you can break off so easily.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 1
dataList.dlg: Don't resent me so, my darling daughter. That's that, and this is this.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 1
dataList.dlg: Don't resent me so, my darling daughter. That's that, and this is this.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 2
dataList.dlg: Peel back the very heavens... and cast aside all that seeks to steal my daughter from me.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 134812 (Furioso 닮은 스킬 - 2페이즈 매우 강력한 스킬) 사용 시 대사 2
dataList.dlg: Peel back the very heavens... and cast aside all that seeks to steal my daughter from me.

dataList.desc: 검지 아비 료슈 쓰러뜨리면서 플레이어가 게임 패배할 경우
dataList.dlg: That is not your fate. Climb out of there, Yoshihide.
You talk... as if I'm gonna choose to stay.

OSHARE
(Overcome the Searing Hellfire for Araya, to Reality's Extinction)
